name: Frank and 10 roots
description: Frank and 10 Roots - a challenging isometric platformer. Put both your abilities and nervous system to the test!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64-bit versions) Processor: Intel Core i5 - 2400 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64-bit versions) Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 4GB
